Method Detail

isOptional

public boolean isOptional()
Whether or not the queued action is optional for a player to perform. An optional action is for example PlayDevelopmentCard during BeforeDiceRoll GamePhase.

Returns:
the isOptional

setOptional

Whether or not the queued action is optional for a player to perform. An optional action is for example PlayDevelopmentCard during BeforeDiceRoll GamePhase.
